definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: My husband works at the local tax office. I work for an insurance company.
sentences.chinese: 我的丈夫在地税局工作，我在保险公司上班。

sentences.english: My husband works in the local revenue office, and I work for insurance agent .
sentences.chinese: 我的丈夫在地税局工作，我在保险公司上班。

sentences.english: A good local tax does not lead to vertical distortions.
sentences.chinese: 好的地税税种并不会引起纵向的税收扭曲。

sentences.english: At the same time, the instrument can see land tax, the actual refers to the household duties.
sentences.chinese: 而同时，文书所见地税，实际是指户税。

sentences.english: A good local tax is linked to benefits.
sentences.chinese: 好的地税税种应与利益挂钩。

sentences.english: Expectation that legislation will authorize value-based land tax.
sentences.chinese: 期望立法能批准基于价值的土地税。

sentences.english: A good local tax is visible and prevents soft budget constraints.
sentences.chinese: 好的地税税种具有可见性，能阻止预算软约束。

sentences.english: A good local tax has a less mobile base.
sentences.chinese: 好的地税其税基的流动性较低。

sentences.english: Be responsible for the monthly state tax & local tax declaration.
sentences.chinese: 负责国税和地税的月度申报工作。

sentences.english: Which taxes are good local taxes?
sentences.chinese: 哪些税收属于好的地税税种？

sentences.english: Third is the area of Xiangtan county-level tax authorities to conduct empirical analysis of the performance evaluation.
sentences.chinese: 三是对湘潭市县级地税机关进行绩效评价实证分析。

sentences.english: Church land is usually exempt from real estate tax.
sentences.chinese: 教堂的土地通常免征土地税。

sentences.english: A good local tax has a base that is horizontally equitable.
sentences.chinese: 好的地税税种具备横向来看较为公平的税基。

sentences.english: Though off-puttingly complicated in detail, local taxes are in essence simple.
sentences.chinese: 虽然地税在细节上复杂得要命，但在本质上却很简单。

definition: to file an income tax return/to declare dutiable goods (at customs)
personal income tax (abbr. for 個人所得稅|个人所得税)
